Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.filter

Interface AlertFilterBuilder<F,S>

Type Parameters:
F - the resulting filter type
S - the label names and values type
public interface AlertFilterBuilder<F,S>
Construct an implementation-specific alert filter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    F
    and(Stream<F> filters)
    Construct a filter that requires all provided filters be matched.
    F
    fromSourceLocation(Stream<SourceOliveLocation> locations)
    Construct a filter that requires alerts be generated from one of the provided olives
    F
    hasLabelName(Pattern labelName)
    Construct filter that matches any alerts that have a label matching the provided regular expression.
    F
    hasLabelName(S labelName)
    Construct filter that matches any alerts that have a label matching the provided name.
    F
    hasLabelValue(S labelName, Pattern regex)
    Construct filter that matches any alerts that have a label, with the provided name, with a value matching the provided regular expression.
    F
    hasLabelValue(S labelName, S labelValue)
    Construct filter that matches any alerts that have a label, with the provided name, with a value equal to the provided value.
    F
    isLive()
    Construct a filter that checks if the alert is firing.
    F
    negate(F filter)
    Inverts the sense of a filter
    F
    or(Stream<F> filters)
    Create a filter that matches any of the supplied filters.
